release_notes: Fixed: Replaced Alert with scrollable modal for Medical Group selection. Now shows ALL groups including 'diabetics' and all custom groups!
fixes: Fixed sync push 409 error: Empty email strings now converted to None
Convert string ID to MongoDB ObjectId() before querying database
Fixed user lookup to handle both _id (ObjectId) and id (UUID) fields
Fixed User import in security.py for sync operations
Added retry logic with exponential backoff
